Game.Name: Pokemon Shiny Gold Sigma
Game.Plot: Pokemon Shiny Gold Sigma: I must way, the Spanish hackers are the talented ones with many different skills. One Spanish author has created a hack of FireRed: Pokemon Shiny Gold Sigma. It is a hack with many improvements about Johto, Kanto, Orange Islands. All the leaders in these two regions are waiting for you to come and pick quarrels. Do you dare? Or not? Okay, whatever you chooseâ€¦ this game is worth playing. Check it out.
